plot outline: Aravinda is a 2011 Indian Kannada film, directed by R T Raju and Produced by Benka. The film stars Aravind Raja and Aishwarya in lead roles. The music of the film was composed by M S Prabhakar.
title: Aravinda
plot: _Aravinda_ (qv) is a 2011 Indian Kannada film, directed by R T Raju and Produced by Benka. The film stars Aravind Raja and Aishwarya in lead roles. The music of the film was composed by M S Prabhakar.
